articles.title: Opinion | How Blockchain Could Fix Facebook's Fake News Problem
articles.description: Facebook has a big fake news problem, and the company can solve that issue by taking a serious look at blockchain technology.

articles.title: Interview: Joe Fanelli, Co-Founder of Top 21 Block Producer EOS Asia
articles.description: CCN interviews Joe Fanelli, a co-founder of EOS Asia, once of the 21 entities processing transactions for the fifth-largest cryptocurrency.

articles.title: Crypto Market Rebounds, Bithumb Drives Kimchi Premium Up 50%
articles.description: Bithumb, formerly the biggest crypto exchange in South Korea, has driven the Kimchi Premium up 30 percent on major tokens, inflating the price of cryptocurrencies.

articles.title: Chinese Social Network Tianya is Launching a Native Cryptocurrency

articles.title: Crypto Exchange HitBTC Adds Support for Euro-Pegged Stablecoin 'EURS'

articles.title: Romania Targets Cryptocurrencies With New Electronic Money Law
articles.description: Romania has become the latest country to institute a regulatory process expressly targeted at cryptocurrencies and digital currencies. A draft of an Emergency Ordinance published by the Romanian Ministry of Finance sets out the conditions and requirements tha…

articles.title: London Remittance Firm Launches Cryptocurrency Trading Service
articles.description: London-based remittance firm TransferGo has launched a cryptocurrency trading service that supports five coins at launch.

articles.author: fb.me/mdsacramento
articles.title: Bitcoin Ransomware Creators Avoid Jail Time for $11,000 Heist
articles.description: Two brothers convicted of creating two bitcoin ransomware strains have narrowly avoided jail time for stealing more than $11,000 from at least 100 victims.

articles.title: Tezos Foundation Taps ‘Big Four’ Firm PwC for Independent Audit
articles.description: The Tezos Foundation has hired "Big Four" auditor PwC to conduct an indepdendent, external audit of its balance sheet and operations.

articles.title: Circle Taps Fmr. Goldman Sachs Executive to Spearhead Regulatory Affairs
articles.description: Cryptocurrency firm Circle has hired a former Goldman Sachs executive to speerhead its regulatory efforts as it expands its global operations.
